data.text: @Uber @RESCUEorg Are you going to raise the passenger rates to compensate for increased fuel prices? Because you need to.
@eflynn06 @Uber @RESCUEorg We are diligently trying to shine light on this issue! Something MUST be done!
@Uber @RESCUEorg They got money 4 war but cant feed the poor... -2Pac

@Betbuddy4u @Uber @UberEats @RESCUEorg Ur food may be cold sometimes.  I picked up Wendy's 4 a customer n it took about 5 minutes.  I also had 2 pick up Popeyes 4 a customer n that took about 20 minutes. Uber had me deliver the Popeyes 1st.  So imagine how cold the Wendy's was by the time i delivered it...🤦🏾‍♂️🤷🏾‍♂️🥴

@Uber @RESCUEorg Wondering if UBER is going to pay us more since gas prices are over $4+  everywhere across the US for the 1st time ever.   If not I'm gonna have to stop driving or see who pays more lyft or uber since I drive for both.
@Uber @RESCUEorg Look at this ! It is too cheap, isn’t ? https://t.co/k3qLXVKHoZ
@Uber @RESCUEorg When do you want to support your drivers then ???!!!
@Uber @RESCUEorg He made a $3.5 billion investment in Uber. So no thanks, we'll grab a yellow cab.
